title: PUBG unit sales worldwide 2018
summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Unit sales in millions in the y axis.
Month June 2018 has the highest Unit sales in millions and May 2017 has the lowest Unit sales in millions.
The highest value at Month June 2018 is 25.0x times more than the lowest value at May 2017.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Unit sales in millions for 5 number of Months.

max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Unit sales in millions in the y axis.
Month June 2018 has the highest Unit sales in millions and May 2017 has the lowest Unit sales in millions.
